attributes.action: Bring all British National Football games back onto terrestrial Television and off SKY.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All national Football should be free to all TV licence holders by terrestrial or digital freeview,  irrespective of whether the game is a friendly, qualifier, final, home or away. It is clearly wrong that SKY are able to make profit from what should be a non profit event. This also means that smaller local licenced establishments are unable to afford the inflated SKY subscription costs.
